word:
Ellen White Did Not Wish to Go to Battle Creek--I do not propose to go to Battle Creek. The memory of the terrible siege I had there for two years, with so few to help me, remains with me as a warning. I prefer to remain in this far-off country.--Letter 87a, 1896, p. 3. (To O. A. Olsen, May 25, 1896.) 


                                   -58-
